summary: CFI INJECTOR UNIT HAS GONE BAD TWICE, AT 58800 MILES AND AGAIN 18 MONTHS LATER, CHEVY DEALER ADMITS IS A COMMON PROBLEM.  CAN ONLY GET REPLACEMENT PART FROM GM AT $500 A PIECE.  PART LEAKS FUEL AND ENGINE WILL NOT START. WHY HASN'T THIS BEEN A RECALL?  IT IS A VERY PROFITABLE SITUATION FOR CHEVROLET.   *JB      ******DIMSII IVOQ ENTRY POSTED AFTER 12/12/02 CUT-OVER TO ARTEMIS****739786***
